Integrity is one of the core values of Amyris and 
we hold ourselves accountable while delivering on 
our commitments. The Amyris Code of Business 
Conduct and Ethics reflects our underlying 
dedication to promote high standards of ethical 
business conduct and compliance with applicable 
laws, rules and regulations. ENSURING HIGH
